website_summaries.verdict: These weaves are 100% unprocessed human hair from one donor. Quality is amazing, fresh right out of the packaging.
pros: Tight and neat with no shedding, tangles, or lice
Colors and curls well, with no dryness
Ships fast, with good customer service
cons: Some may find bundles of hair as "dry as the Sahara."
Could shed and tangle easily over extended time

customer_reviews.title: Best hair! Follow my Instagram: j.harlemluxe
customer_reviews.text: Best hair I have ever received!!! Silky! No tangles! No smell! Light shedding! Frontal bleached perfectly! I got 18-20-22 and 16 inch frontal I think! I’m 5”0 and I have gotten 22” before! This 22” looks like a 26” on me ! I love it so much! Will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Jadyn

customer_reviews.title: ... The Hair Today And So Far This Hair Is Amazing I have Bleached The Hair And Didnt Shed
customer_reviews.text: Just Got The Hair Today And So Far This Hair Is Amazing I have Bleached The Hair And Didnt Shed I have dyed the hair red and still no shedding still soft and no tangles will reccomend
customer_reviews.author: keaura

customer_reviews.title: After Install Everything was GREAT ! !
customer_reviews.text: Well, I ordered the 12” closure with 14”,16”, & 18” bundles. So, upon unboxing, I always measure the lengths of my hair and closures. When I stretched the closure; it only measured to 10” but my install was scheduled for the day I received the hair so it was pointless to send it back but the seller did communicate with me and offered me options to rectify the situation. I absolutely love my hair now, it’s beautiful. Will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Sereiyha

customer_reviews.title: I received my hair & absolutely LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I received my hair & absolutely LOVE IT!!! No Shedding, Bleached it & no funny smells like some hair. I will be ordering more & will advise my clients to purchase from this seller. Being a stylist/salon owner for 14 yrs, I definitely know good hair & I must say this gets 5 stars. I ordered 14, 16, 18 & 12" closure!!! PERFECT, PERFECT, PERFECT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jewel seals

customer_reviews.title: Holds Curls, Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered from this company 3 times and have not been disappointed. The body wave hair has a nice wave when its in its natural state. When I curled the hair the curls last long, longer than any other hair I’ve ever had. I did a half up half down hairstyle and This last time, I bought 3 bundles and a frontal. Only issue I had was the frontal lace being dark but I made it work and the lace doesn’t come pre-plucked so you have to customize it. Overall the quality of the hair is good, especially for the price. Check my Youtube channel @forevershani for a review
customer_reviews.author: Forever Shani

customer_reviews.title: Beeaauuttiiffuull hair!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I knew when I saw hundreds of people gave this company 5 stars it had to be exceptional! I bought 3 bundles....when they say 300 grams they rent kidding...I had hair for 2 wigs. I have never seen wefts like this...I Dont think its double stitched but triple stitched. There is no possible way for shedding except for where the weft has been cut. The wefts have a terrific and natural hair blend in that they have long and medium hair. I washed the hair and ran my fingers through it without one snag and thought...this is as soft as butter!!! Incredible deal! And customer service is A1!!
customer_reviews.author: Truth teller

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just love the hair soooo much.The bundles are so soft and no shedding, I got it done for my birthday . It didn’t come with any smell, it’s soft and doesn’t shed. The hair is just marvelous, bundles are full, the closure was perfect. It is really great I recommend to get this. The hair is just LIFE! Updated:The hair is really Great after One Month.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: This hair is beautiful. My niece is a beautician and she co-signed ...
customer_reviews.text: This hair is beautiful. My niece is a beautician and she co-signed how the quality of this hair was great! I thought the closure was too short at first , however once installed it blended in nicely with the rest of the bundles. I will definitely reorder this hair again. I like to keep my hair for a year. So we shall see if it keeps up after a few installs. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: LaQuanna

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Yesterday, Returning Today!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo Disappointed! Buyer beware. The majority of the reviews are for bundles of hair that women have installed & I thought that great quality would translate to their wigs. It does not. The wig is thin, smells smokey, sheds easily, poorly made wherein the closure line is clearly visible because of the low density. Arrived yesterday, returning today! UPDATE 6/10/2020. THE RETURN PROCESS HAS BEEN HORRIBLE AS THE SELLER IS HOLDING MY REFUND HOSTAGE AND TRYING TO GET ME TO ERASE MY REVIEW. AFTER NUMEROUS EMAILS BEING HARRASED I FINALLY CONTACTED AMAZON TO INTERCEDE ON MY BEHALF AND ISSUE MY REFUND. DO NOT BUY FROM THIS VENDOR!!!
customer_reviews.author: DIONNE LAYNE HINDS

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Am speechless! Best wig ever!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this wig just few days ago and delivery was fast, the hair is so soft and i dnt need to even use hair glue on the lace..i just cut out the excess lace and slayed it..it is really cheap for the quality..i will hastily recommend anyone for this product. Good job Amella hair👌
customer_reviews.author: Kumbish

customer_reviews.title: Nah
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your time. The hair is a mess. It’s split ends from track to bottom. Nothing is aligned right. Doesn’t hold a curl and some of my hair burned when i curled it. DONT DO IT! Please! Updated 11/14/19 The seller reached out and sent me different hair which was actually longer and a lot better than the first batch. Just made a unit and so far so good. Haven’t curled it yet but it straightens pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Niaa

customer_reviews.title: Stick With What You Know!
customer_reviews.text: It’s Very Soft and Holds A Curl. it’s Also Very Thin and Sheds Entirely Tooooo MUCH. As Of 3/14/2020 I Have Been Bribed With Money To Change My Review Because the Hair SHEDS & already Is Thin as It is/comes. This Vendor Is Something else!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauryn

customer_reviews.title: My favorite hair brand does it again!
customer_reviews.text: I love Amella hair and was so surprised to find that they offer wigs! I ordered the 16 inch. It was soft and bouncy! I dyed it blue black with Bigen hair color and conditioned it with silicon mix . A few flexirods after my install and had curls all day long! Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Miya

customer_reviews.title: Great hair and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 14, 16, and 18 bundles with a 12 inch closure and I absolutely love this hair! Customer service was so nice even from when they first shipped my order! I did have some shedding but that’s only because my stylist used a fine tooth comb. The hair so so soft and everyone loves me hair, they think it’s my natural hair! Lol. I definitely will be ordering from this seller again! Update: had hair for about a month now and it does shed quite a bit. If you keep it detangled and use your fingers or a side tooth comb it won’t shed as much. Nevertheless I will purchase from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Brianne Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Not what you think.
customer_reviews.text: Great hair at the moment of install but that’s it. When I had it first installed it was beautiful and bouncy. However after a few wears, the hair tangled horribly bad. And the shedding is horrendous. They’re many great reviews. Maybe ppl are getting different hair.......UPDATE TO THE REVIEW. IT IS POSSIBLE I DIDNT MAINTAIN THE HAIR. IM NOT SURE. BUT THE SELLERS WERE KIND AND REPLACED WITH NEW BUNDLES. I AM NOT FOR DECEPTION. I WILL NOT REMOVE MY INITIAL REVIEW BUT I WILL KINDLY UPDATE THE STARS DUE TO CUSTOMER SERVICE.
customer_reviews.author: Micki

customer_reviews.title: This is some great hair
customer_reviews.text: 1 month update!!!!!!!!!!!! This is amazing. Shipping was extremely fast. The bundles are thick and the frontal lace is perfect. I posted a review on YouTube look me up @ staceyAlexis and look me up on Instagram @ hair.by.stacey for photos and video...... UPDATE!!!!!!!!!! I’m posting an update look me up on YouTube to see it but just a heads up this hair is STILL AMAZING!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Blue

customer_reviews.title: I Wish I Could Give This Hair 10 Stars!!! A Must Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Hair Is Absolutely Amazing!!! The Quality Of This Hair Is Unbelievable!!! The Hair Is So Pretty... Very Soft... Full...It Doesn’t Have An Ordor... And There’s No Shedding Or Tangling!!! (And I Didn’t Seal The Wefts Or Co-Wash) The Hair Is Fresh Out The Package!!! The Seller Keeps In Contact And Makes Sure You’re Completely Satisfied! I Will Definitely Buy Again!!! Plus The Lashes They Sent With The Hair Is Gorgeous. I Have The Lashes On In My Pics!!! Great Company With Great Hair!!!
customer_reviews.author: Candy Cane

customer_reviews.title: Sheds more than it should!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to live this hair it was very soft and did not tangle. However it sheds a LOT. I wear a basic straight style but the hair was everywhere and quit embarrassing to find it all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Y’all have to order this wig 😻😻🥵
customer_reviews.text: This wig is bomb asf 😻😻😻😻. I fell in love when I first got it. Looks exactly like the picture. The hair is soft and tangle free. And it doesn’t shed at all. Will be ordering this a lot and I will refer this to a lot of people. Will update you guys when I put the wig on.
customer_reviews.author: azya

customer_reviews.title: Hair is thin sheds a lot.
customer_reviews.text: This hair is no good dont waist the little money you pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: yolanda smith

customer_reviews.title: Best hair I’ve ever ordered
customer_reviews.text: First of all the hair is packaged nicely, the seller even includes a free pair of lashes and a weaving net with your purchase. After unboxing the hair is soft and true to length, thick all the way down to the ends. I co washed the hair before installation and I’ve had it in for about 2 weeks and have gotten no tangles and very minimal shedding . I maintain the body wave texture by putting it in 4 braids at night . The seller is very sweet and professional and responds really fast.
customer_reviews.author: Breana Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality BUT SHEDS LIKE CRAZY!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful hair. Great quality BUT SHEDS A LOT smh. Luckily the bundles are full so it doesn’t look thin but the shedding makes it a product that can’t be reused unless you plan to do a sleek ponytail next. My only complaint is the shedding. Manufacturer needs to work on making sure as much hair is secured in the weft as possible. Rookie mistake but can easily be fixed if they use the right technique.
customer_reviews.author: Tarrence Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful hair.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this hair in for about 4 days now. It’s really soft and I can run my hands through it effortlessly. The hair didn’t have a weird smell and it isn’t having any shedding. I did bleach the knots and it took well to the bleach. So far so good, and I hope it keeps it up!
customer_reviews.author: Geonoir

customer_reviews.title: * Update Review * Great Customer Service & They care about customer satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: **Updated review*** The owner reached out to me and offered to promptly fix the situation, and did. They do have amazing customer service and aim to make sure their customers are happy. To be honest, I would give this company another chance simply because they care about their products and customer satisfaction. So if you have any issues reach out to the owner and the will fix the situation quickly. ***Previous Comment**** I Wouldn’t buy again. This hair matted so much and shed even more. I was always brushing and a few secs later it would Matt again. It sheds A LOT! It became annoying to the point I just cut the hair. I wouldn’t recommend this hair.
customer_reviews.author: Beanca

customer_reviews.title: This hair is awesome. I haven’t had any shedding at all
customer_reviews.text: This hair is awesome. I haven’t had any shedding at all. It colors well. The bundles are full and the closure is one of the best that I’ve seen, and let me add that I have been a licensed Cosmetologist for 26 years. I will most definitely be ordering from here again. I would like to thank the company and ask that they keep up the great work.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but you get what you paid for...
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 bundles in my head and within weeks it continually knotted and matted and shed like crazy. I did not color the hair at all. I’ve tried trimming, flat ironing and it continues to become matted just sitting in my car or at my desk. I’m not use to this because the previous hair I purchased from another vendor although more expensive lasted for more than a year and had very little shedding and no matting issues. I can’t wait to take this hair out! If you purchase I would say you’ll get about a month of good use and then you’ll be ready to take it out.
customer_reviews.author: MizVH

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hair for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The hair is decent for the price. Nice wave. Nice amount of hair in bundles. Easy to curl. I decided not to use the closure for my own personal reasons. My only issue is a little bit of shedding (which may be a normal weave issue) and it smells weird when wet. I had to wash and condition it a few times and it still smells a little when wet.
customer_reviews.author: Alecia Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great hair..will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Love this hair..soft and beautiful..no tangles. Wore it for my wedding
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: It was ok when I had it installed yesterday. However the hair came jet black. I tried dying it a lighter shade and it did not dye at all . If fact it became darker. I washed and conditioned it really well. Overnight it seemed to tangle and look old. I've only had it in for a day lol. This morning it looks like old weave. Lol.. I'm scared too see what it will look like by the end of the week.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Grier

customer_reviews.title: Fresh out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The hair off of first impression looks and feels great! No smell, smooth texture and true to length. The closure is pre-plucked and I’m extremely happy about that! I will post more pictures and another update after the hair is washed and installed. UPDATE- after washing I notified the closure lost its curl. I only used conditioner so this was odd. After I got my sew-in my stylist curled my hair and it looked beautiful. However I noticed the closure does not hold a curl as well as the bundles and the closure is thin. Overall I’m pleased with the bundles but the closure could be constructed a lot better. I’ve only had the hair in a week.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha L.

customer_reviews.title: Loveee
customer_reviews.text: The hair is AMAZING! The waves are soooo beautiful wet and dry and the hair is super super soft and it doesn’t shed much even when you run your fingers through it, it doesn’t shed! The hair doesn’t shed. I recommend this hair 100% The wig is beautiful and the lace melts. I don’t need to do much plucking. Nice hair line. i love it already. excellent hair and service! Stay tuned for pictures and videos. Of the the hair Instagram @ texturesofmelanin
customer_reviews.author: Jikayla

customer_reviews.title: This hair is amazing. The bundles are nice and full from top ...
customer_reviews.text: First let me start by saying this hair shipped in 2 days which was a major plus !!! I will never by hair from my local beauty vendors again ! This hair is amazing. The bundles are nice and full from top to bottom. The lace on the closure was a prefect match with my skin tone no bleaching needed! I Plan to order longer bundles from the following vendor !
customer_reviews.author: Ms_zachery

customer_reviews.title: Bad idea
customer_reviews.text: The Amelia hair shipped quickly and the hair was so soft out of the box. After washing the hair and having a professional install, I realized that the hair wasn’t good quality. The ends were really thin, it SHED like a German Shepard, and lost its lust after a few days. I was sad that I had to take the sew in out after two weeks due to shedding and hair tangles really bad. I guess you get what you pay for ...
customer_reviews.author: Bria Lewis

customer_reviews.title: The quality was the best it curls so perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Hair is really good quality dyed it black have had it installed twice since I've had it,washed it about six times only because I use got2b glue every other day,I love the frontal it is still in perfect condition out side of me plucking it to my liking I will be ordering again in a few weeks and was surprised at the low price I have bought high dollar high it it never was this good,I love love this hair#update Jan 2019 I’m still rocking this hair same frontal I’m amazed 6 months later
customer_reviews.author: Jim England

customer_reviews.title: Overall good I’m not sure if I’ll re-purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at tons of hair on Amazon and didn’t realize this was processed hair. However it’s really soft, full, and true to length. I pre-washed and it didn’t tangle. It holds a curl well. The only negative it does shade quite a bit. Overall good I’m not sure if I’ll re-purchase. Update...After making my initial review the seller contacted me, and offered some additional care instructions, including a deep condition. I will re-purchase, good hair and great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Beware Horrible Hair
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever do reviews. When I received the hair it looked very thin but had a wave pattern. After my install which was only the next day, I was very disappointed. The hair sheds a lot & then once out of the package the body wave pattern was no more. It was like an old curly hair look. I will not be ordering from this company ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hair. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Great hair. The hair is soft and full. This is 3 bundles and a closure. I’m still figuring out how to lay the baby hair down on top the closure, but it’s not that big a deal. I can’t speak for shedding yet because I made this into a wig and won’t wear it too much. But the customer service is excellent. This was the first of 2 orders I placed. This hair was so nice I went right ahead and order the deep wave.
customer_reviews.author: Sheirre

customer_reviews.title: Honest Review
customer_reviews.text: At first this hair was so soft and beautiful I was pleased to get it installed. After being installed this hair was thin from excessive shedding. The shedding is HORRIBLE. I’ve never had straight hair shed this much on top of that the hair tangled very easily which human normally does not do excessively I’m disappointed. Don’t waste your money unless your gonna wear the hair for two days
customer_reviews.author: Anijah Wadud

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write this review until I had the hair installed and wore it for a while. I ordered it on October 27 and received it the 29 and installed it that same day. After almost of month I can say I love this hair. There is minimal shedding and it easily detangles. This was my first time using a closure but I think it looks very natural. I haven't processed the hair so I can't speak on that, but it does hold a curl and can be straightened. Would order again!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: I WAITED 3 WEEKS FOR THIS????!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I waited three weeks to receive this wig. I have been wearing lace front wigs for 10 years. This is the WORST ONE EVER!!!! I would be here all day saying all that’s wrong with it. Think 3 times before buying from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Redus

customer_reviews.title: Great hair
customer_reviews.text: A great deal for the bundle I selected. The hair is gorgeous and it didn’t have a smell when I took it out the bag. It came in a cute little box along with lashes, and a cap. I will update later after I get my sew in.. Update: hair was install 5/6 and its amazing. I used a little curl unleashed leave in conditioner and water to give it that look. The 3 part closure I am loving the most. I purchased the 18,20,&22 with 16in closure. Will be buying more hair from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Amella
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 bundles & a closure (20”22”24”+18”) of body wave hair. Hair was packaged nicely & I received it quickly. There was no smell, no shedding nor tangling & the length is true to size. Although I flat iron & curled it myself I noticed it does go back to its natural state after showering (so basically when wet). Ps I made the hair into a wig & have yet to pluck it considering it makes it easier to transition into other styles.
customer_reviews.author: Xxx

customer_reviews.title: Hair is beautiful, and It hold a curl like a dream ...
customer_reviews.text: Hair is beautiful, and It holds a curl like a dream with very minimal shedding, and no tangling. I like my hair full, so I wear a frontal plus 4 bundles, a 24in (ordered from a different vendor) 22in 20in and most of an 18in. My 22 and 20 were the same length (22in) so I guess they didn't have a 20... IDK. I was afraid when I saw the frontal, I thought it was too thin, but it turned out to be perfect. I've been wearing the hair as a sew in for about 2 weeks with no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Apple

customer_reviews.title: This is some good hair!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 16/18/20 with a 14 in. closure. This is my second time ordering this hair. I love it. It’s very soft and easy to manage. Bundles are very full. Hair is true to length The only thing I don’t like is that it’s very dark almost black. Usually bundles come natural color. This hair curls up really pretty but doesn’t really holds a curl for too long. I will attempt to lighten the hair in a few weeks. This hair does shed but shedding is minimal. I did cut my wefts in the 16/18 inch bundles so that may be why it sheds. I highly recommend this hair. This is the best hair I’ve bought from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: T. Leverette

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: This is my first review on Amazon. I normally never have an issue with Amazon products, I try to read all the reviews before purchasing anything. This time it was an epic fail. The hair that I purchased feels so rough and hard, it feels like it's mixed with filler hair. I will NEVER purchase from this company again unless they prove that they have good quality hair. The hair tangles like crazy and is so rough, it doesn't hold a curl and will nap up quickly at the ends. I'm not sure if I got a bad batch but I'm warning you to be cautious when you purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Angelia Miller

customer_reviews.title: @prettylittlewigsco I LOVE THIS HAIR
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was super fast. When the hair first arrived, it did come with a smell. I wash it with dove and the smell left. Im very amazed how soft the hair was even after washing. Yes it sheds a little but that’s to be expected. I mean it only cost $53 so i can deal with that! I really love how little the knots were on the closure. Made the bleaching process easy for me. I made a messy bob wig out of it and overall im impressed and satisfied with it. Just ordered some longer hair again today. Hope I get the same quality. Also follow me on instagram @prettylittlewigsco
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this hair!!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the quality of this hair, especially for the price. I waited more than 3 weeks to write this review intentionally to see if it was still in good condition. I feel the same way today. Minimal shedding and looks good still.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. McAWR

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: This hair is so bomb! For those of you who do not know what that means it’s is wonderful it hardly sheds there’s no smell it comes in a beautiful box packaged so nice and with free eye lashes I have had a ton of complaints with this hair. I straightened it and crimped it. It looks and feels natural. I will buy this hair again I ordered the 12 inch frontal and the 14 and 16 inch hair my hair dresses made it work I should have ordered a longer frontal but no worries it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Good Hair
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair , I decided to make a wig out of it because it was cheap & didn’t know how good it would be , but it’s some VERY good hair for the price , very few shedding and no smell .. the only thing I didn’t like is it doesn’t really hold tight curls so I ended up letting my curls drop and wearing it wavy but other than that it’s perfect especially for the price , I would definitely order again !
customer_reviews.author: kierra

customer_reviews.title: The best hair on Amazon!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Dear Amella Hair, I've been getting so many compliments since my last purchased with you that I thought I should stop taking all the credit and pass on some appreciation to the person who's actually responsible for my new look – you! My hair looks and feels fantastic, and I'm so grateful to have a company that knows how to take care of there customer. my hair arrived in 3 days faster than I thought it would. It Was packaged nicely with a nice gift inside for me . I'm recommending you to all my girlfriends. To purchase your hair here before they ran out. Thanks again for everything,
customer_reviews.author: crystal alli

customer_reviews.title: Save your money bad!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for I needed an install Quick and And purchased the hair is thin throughout it is not holding its body wave texture one day after the install. Updated review seller contacted me to receive partial compensation for the product. I did not take the deal this is after washing it for the first time as you can see how thin three bundles of hair are. I have previously purchased from Amazon and had success with other companies but I will no longer be buying from this company buyer we warned you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Alexa s

customer_reviews.title: When I received the hair it was packaged very nice and came with two pair of lashes
customer_reviews.text: When I received the hair it was packaged very nice and came with two pair of lashes. This hair is very very soft!!! I love how soft it is and how pretty it looks once curled. The frontal was very nice also. The only thing I don’t like is I wish the hair and frontal was a bit thicker. I would have to put a lot of hair in my hair to make it really full. But other than that the hair is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joevonder Jones

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair! I use it often and its very reasonable. The hair curls beautifully and holds curl. I'm going to continue to order this hair when I want to switch up my look or make a unit. Definitely 5 stars 🌟
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: After and initial setback when Amazon lost my package, it was finally delivered. It came in unassuming packaging and included a set set of lashes as well as a mesh wig cap. The hair was soft to the touch and the pattern was amazing. No foul smell. I used 3 of the 4 bundles to make a u-part wig, the hair installed very easily and the weft construction was great. This is my first time wearing this hair however I have installed it on a few clients and they all rave about it being long wear. I will update this review after I’ve had this hair in for a while, to share how it holds up! Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful easy to use wig for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: This hair came beautifully packaged! It was extremely soft and full!! I got body wave and straightened it! It straightened super easily and looked even better!! The bangs are really full so here are some before and after pics of me customizing them! The wig is very good for a style on the go!!! 😊😍 want to know more? I reviewed this hair on my YouTube Channel: Marian Elise
customer_reviews.author: M*****

customer_reviews.title: Try a different brand!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the worst bundles of hair that I’ve purchased on Amazon. I usually buy another brand and tried something new, but definitely regretting it! I had the hair installed 2 weeks ago and it will have to be taken down no later than next week. It has become very ratty looking on the ends, frayed and difficult to manage. It won’t style or hold a curl at all. It is also shedding horribly! Just choose another brand. ETA: The seller reached out in an effort to fix the situation. They offered to give me more bundles for free and swore by their product. I declined, but do appreciate the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Christina R.

customer_reviews.title: I’m loving this hair
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying this hair is soooo pretty and soft!! No smell to it . Came in a natural color with no different color strands. For the price this hair is definitely worth it. I ordered Friday and received it on Saturday with Amazon Prime. I will come back with an update when I install and wash the hair a few times. First impressions are everything. UPDATE~~ LOVE this hair for the price it’s amazing . Still no shedding or tangling. Super super soft. 💕 will definitely be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Daisha Tolliver

customer_reviews.title: ... was very surprise to say that I made a good choice the hair is great and there was very ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying bundles from amazon but I was very surprise to say that I made a good choice the hair is great and there was very minimal shedding I would say the avg for any hair extensions. the bundles were nice and full. I love the fact that I could wear it straight and wet it and get this pretty wavy look. the one thing is that it didn't hold a curl for long when you curl it but when I flexi rod it the curls last longer.sidenote: I got my closure from some where else
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer service
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommend this hair, sadly. It isn’t virgin by a long shot. Also, it sheds horrendously. I’ve had it for 24 hours and I’m only keeping it installed because I have somewhere to be. I will have to finesse it. It wasn’t super expensive but definitely isn’t what it claims to be. Update: the seller reached out to me to rectify the issue. I’d recommend based on the customer service and numerous options they provided to fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck. Don't let the price fool you
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical on doing a review because I don't want the world to find out about this company and buy them out of stock lol Omg when I tell yall cant nobody tell me nothing with this hair installed. Package arrived in 2 days with prime no smell beautifully soft and very minimal shedding those far. I am wearing the hair in its natural state so far and will update on how well it holds a curl. Closure is flawless and looks like it's growing from my scalp! I ordered 14/16/18 with 12 in 3 part and didn't even use the 14 and was able to have my big full beyonce hair and flow that I love
customer_reviews.author: Marketa

customer_reviews.title: 😍 Pre plucked Hair line!
customer_reviews.text: 7/23/18 Have not installed yet. I WILL update once died and installed! I LOVE the pre plucked hair line
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Good texture but does thin over time!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I do like this hair for the price! I normally pay $300 for my hair from a local hair store in LA area so in comparison to that it doesn’t come close. This hair does thin over time because of constant shedding, but that is expected with this price. But the hair doesn’t tangle, it’s soft and doesn’t take much maintenance. You’d probably have to purchase new hair for every install because of the thinning. But overall it is good quality hair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT feeling ❤️
customer_reviews.text: So I absolutely love this wig and highly recommend I am dealing with hair loss and wanted to try something new, so I went ahead and shaved my hair off and bought this wig. I measured the thin strands of my longest hairs and bought based on that so I would have something similar to what my real hair would look like, and it’s crazy. This purchase has already made a huge difference in my confidence, and happiness, truly life changing. You have a Return customer out of me for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: must have😍
customer_reviews.text: the hair has a really natural hairline I didn’t have to pluck it and it’s really soft and light . The cap is a snug fit , the wig doesn’t shed or tangle and it doesn’t have a smell . Overall it has a really natural look to it 😌
customer_reviews.author: Ayana

customer_reviews.title: Its worth the buy for a one to two week hairstyle.
customer_reviews.text: I dont like the fact that its advertised as 100% human hair. There's obviously synthetic hair in the mix. But for the price its worth it. I plan on using it for a bob. Like a one week stlye. I will update. Overall if you dont plan using the hair more than once i say buy it. Its not virgin. But its way better quality than beauty supply. Update. Had the hair in for a week. Its totally worth it. I suggest get 4 bundles thats all. Closure goos hair is good. Prejudged this hair because of the smell. But a waah did it right. Pattern is great. Buy this hair. You wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Shetee

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about 8 months
customer_reviews.text: Please excuse my foam head, she has been through a lot of styles. I had this hair for two days. I washed it and made a wig with it. I gave 5 stars because I have not had it long. It take heat well, holds a curl without adding holding spray. You will see that I have a pic before and after I comb through the crimps. So far so good. Update: the hair is starting to shed and the texture has changed especially in the frontal. So my hair lasted about 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Hair sheds a bit but is very soft and barely had a smell to it. It is true to length and came with a cap. Edited - was contacted by seller and told to deep condition hair which helped with shedding. Throughout contact with the seller, they were extremely helpful and offered multiple solutions to make sure I was happy with the hair (which is still very soft and holds heat well). Amazing customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Dani C.

customer_reviews.title: Good hair, Sheds
customer_reviews.text: Hair is good. Bought for my birthday 🎂 🥳 my stylist was impressed. I was satisfied, only thing is the hair sheds a lot. I got a quick weave, it’s been up for a week still looking good. I’ll update you guys on when I color it and make a wig!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good hair. It is soft and doesn’t tangle easily
customer_reviews.text: Very good hair. It is soft and doesn’t tangle easily. It is thick as well, gives you a full look. Want good quality hair for less , you’re here ! Not synthetic looking very natural looking .
customer_reviews.author: Kassidy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love this hair ladies
customer_reviews.text: Love this hair ladies! When I tell you I'm the one to spend $300 or better on bundles and these work just as good please take my word. You will save so much money. This hair is soft doesn't shed and I love my closure as well. This is my first time getting it so I will have to write another review after the 2nd installment. I believe this is where they girls who sale hair buys theirs from and charge customers 3xs. Glad I took the chance and purchased them. Love it so far!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Natural Looking Hair FULL BUNDLES
customer_reviews.text: Installed (April 4) let me start off by saying this vendor has GREAT customer service! I’ll be buying from this vendor simply because of that! :) I’m pretty rough with hair. I sleep with a bonnet on every night to make sure hair will hold up. The hair still has its body wave pattern! I will be return back to order! :)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Roller coaster
customer_reviews.text: The hair was super thin need to order least 3 more bundles the company is great they care about consumers responds the reach out me immediately to help address the issue love the customer services I’m just big in using bundles it was my second getting them done it was not what I expected but the hair quality is over all good it really soft like the loose curls
customer_reviews.author: destinee

customer_reviews.title: Still a no, but thanks for reaching out :)
customer_reviews.text: Writing this review after having it for a while and I want to say.. It gets the job done if you want it for like a week or two, but the longevity of it is just not good. Definitely needed to be cut after a month of having it bc the ends were tangling with every move. Doesn’t get bone straight. UPDATE::: After leaving a review customer service was able to issue me a refund. Which is kind, & thank you.
customer_reviews.author: The wise one

customer_reviews.title: ⭐️ 100 STARS ⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Let me first star by saying ladies, no need to debate or be skeptical : THIS HAIR IS BEAUTIFUL . Delivery was timely and per usual, I installed my bundles on a dome cap for a unit . As i was sewing the hair down I kept touching it . I was in disbelief about how soft the hair was . I’ve been wearing the unit I made for about a month and this hair is the bomb. I even was in touch with customer service , they were amazing as well !! Ladies , don’t wait, place your order NOW
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This hair is definitely worth your money. It’s soft, natural and easy to maintain. I did run into an issue where the hair seemed to be dry and didn’t curl as well. But I reached out to the seller and they was able to take care of the issue quickly and also provide me good tips to keep my hair beautiful. They definitely have good customer service and willing to help out if you have any issues. I definitely will purchase from them again as well 😁😁
customer_reviews.author: Carmisha Klutz

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hair last minute for my birthday in August. The hair I initially bought didn’t come in time and I had to get this in a time crunch. It was delivered quickly and did the job. It’s not the best hair I’ve had but it’s not the worst. The ends were thin and it shed a lot when brushed but that’s expected for the price I paid for 3 bundles and a closure. I would probably purchase again if I just wanted a quick sew in or to make a wig.
customer_reviews.author: Danica Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Wash it first!!
customer_reviews.text: The only good thing about this hair is that its soft, and doesn't shed. The hair is really thin compared to other hair I have purchased in this price point, and I used all the bundles. It also dont hold a curl, and I used hair spray. I am really disappointed and wish I could get my money back. Update: Customer service was great. The company got in touch with me in regards to the hair and gave myme pointers in restoring it. That in my opinion means a lot. Please wash and condition the hair before you install it, it makes a Big Difference!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Returning.
customer_reviews.text: I'm returning regardless the constant emails from the seller. The cap is huge, soooooo many fly aways they act as fillers. I have no idea how I am suppose to bring all them hair downs. I don't want to stress it so it's going back. Hair line isn't even the same throughout. Hair is dark in color like black. It is soft, that's all I have to say.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Gem
customer_reviews.text: This is my new go to Hair! Can’t beat the price and the hair held up just as good as any other expensive hair I’ve purchased. I’ve only had it in for about 6 days but I got it in for my sisters wedding. I’m attaching a pic of the hair in it’s natural state after being dyed black and washed n air dried. And the second pic is from the wedding 😍
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: First time doing a review, and I have to say this is a must buy! I just ordered this and I really love it. The hair came right on time (one day shipping). I have ordered hair before that has weird smell but not this one. I made a wig out of it and the three bundles were more than enough. It’s now one week, no tangling, no shedding, I just love it. I have also received a lot of complements from my workmates. I will definitely order this hair again and I 100% recommended this
customer_reviews.author: Cheche

customer_reviews.title: Made with trashy scrap Thin hair ....
customer_reviews.text: This was nothing like the picture. 16 inches WHERE ??? . Short , thin , texture was completely off . This wig was made with scraps . Definitely returning it
customer_reviews.author: Nyeisha

customer_reviews.title: Nice hair for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like this hair.. hated the closure since it’s pre-parted. The hair is soft, doesn’t tangle and brushes out easily with some detangler. I’ve had it in for about a month.. it does shed a lot but I suck at taking care of hair so that might contribute to most of the shedding.. Also, the smell when I first got it was quite strong but a good wash and condition got rid of it. Would def buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality hair so far!
customer_reviews.text: Hello everyone, a little so far about my hair purchased. I ordered my hair (18,20,22 +16closure) on a Saturday morning and received my hair the next day ,which was Sunday afternoons “awesome” I installed the hair the following Tuesday. I haven’t had any shredding so far. The texture is very soft like how I expected. I will be posting a monthly update on the hair. I love hair and if I get great results from this hair I will be ordering again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Ebony Gandy

customer_reviews.title: Hands-down the best hair for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands-down the best hair I've ever purchased at a reasonable price! Soft, natural-looking, no shedding, no smell. I'm a repeat customer. I've gotten straight and Brazilian wave, natural black and ombre 1B and 30. All of the hair products have been equally great. I have never been so pleased with my hair purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Eff

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this hair! I received two packs of lashes and They also provide amazing customer service! I purchased this hair awhile ago and the company actually kept in touch with me, making sure I like my hair. Money well spent. I’ll definitely purchase more, as well as recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: 😍

customer_reviews.title: Great hair! Soft, affordable, and very natural look & feel
customer_reviews.text: It arrived really fast. Also included two gifts. The hair looks really natural & high quality. The hair has a really pretty natural black color mixed with a little brown. The brown isn't overwhelming which looks great. Initially gave it 4 stars for slight odor when it arrived. It could be from the packaging, but not overwhelming. The seller reached out very promptly and addressed my concerns. Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the hair is good. I will have it installed tomorrow and will update pictures after. Overall, my experience has been great I literally had the hair in 24 hours. Super Quick Shipping!! Also, when I reached out to seller about issue they resolved it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Hair and Great Vendor!
customer_reviews.text: If you want hair that styles easily with flexirods and rollers, this is the hair for you! If you want hair that doesn't tangle or shed like crazy, this is the hair for you! If you want curls that hang in there for the long haul, again this is the hair for you! Lastly, if you want a vendor that will customize the bundles for the sizes and quantity needed, this company is the one for you!
customer_reviews.author: C. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY HAIR/REASONABLE PRICES!
customer_reviews.text: MY DAUGHTER WANTED A CLOSURE FOR FOR BACK TO SCHOOL... I DON’T KNOW MUCH ABOUT BUNDLES BUT MY SISTER ORDERED FROM AMELLA BEFORE AND SO DECIDED TO GIVE THEM A TRY..AND BOY AM I SO HAPPY I DID!!! HER HAIR CAME OUT SO BEAUTIFUL NO TANGLES THE HAIR IS SOFT AND OF VERY GOOD QUALITY NO SHEDDING THEY ALSO HAVE GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE VERY ATTENTIVE AND PROFESSIONAL I would recommend them as well as buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, at a great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair! My order came came extremely fast. Like in 1 day after ordering it instead of 2 days. The company emailed me about any concerns about the hair I might have shortly after it had arrived to me. It was packaged really nice and I got a pair of free lashes with my order! The hair was soft and it didn’t have a smell. I have recommended this company to a few of my friends already, I give Amella Hair 👍🏽👍🏽 😌!! I will be ordering again really soon because it’s a great buy for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: RHONDA

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive quality hair !
customer_reviews.text: Hair is very beautiful, soft and not many tangles. There was a bit of shedding but I believe it is because I cut the wefts for a quick weave install. Overall I will be buying the hair again. Only con is the hair smells. I would suggest washing it before using. Very happy with my purchase !!!
customer_reviews.author: Giselle Oliphant

customer_reviews.title: I was so hesitant to buy hair online but I ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so hesitant to buy hair online but I was pleasantly surprised. I only gave this hair 4 stars because I didn't care for the closure, mainly due to the parting. It is a three way part but it's hard to change the parting because it seems a little sparse so you see the spacing. Otherwise, the hair was soft and has minimal shedding. I curled it using the wand it held the curl very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received the hair and so far it looks great. I haven’t installed it yet but I will ...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: 5 months later and I’m still loving my hair! I’ve straightened it, curled it and wet it and it’s still beautiful. Only con is that my frontal is balding and I have bald spots which is irritating. Received the hair and so far it looks great. Very soft. Hair texture is great. Waves up beautifully with just water. Frontal is good alittle thin but still good..
customer_reviews.author: Diva Wife

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy!!! Unbeatable Price for the Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money ! I only had an issue with the smell, I cringe at the smell of sour bundles. After two washes it was fine. Bleaching takes a little longer but it dies come out beautifully. Packaging was soooo cute ! I still have the box I store weaving items in it. Def buying again
customer_reviews.author: Barnes Family

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: I will never ever buy this hair again or anything from this brand. Ever. It sheds SO bad AND it gets tangled beyond belief. I am PISSED that I wasted my money on this. Like upon arrival, it was so soft and pretty. Literally two days later after my professional install, it was so.. terrible. Never again. Don't buy it. UPDATE: Someone from customer service reached out to me to assist me with my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Love this hair
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I bought this hair for my daughter for her birthday and installed it 2 weeks after receiving the hair for the last 5th harmony concert b4 the break up of the group and it is absolutely awesome. The first week she was wearing it curled with a curling iron and now she wet it and wears it natural looking. Very little shedding and it looks amazing. I would definitely recommend this hair it's well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz J.

customer_reviews.title: Hair is as described
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving 4 stars because I haven’t actually installed the hair yet. But shipping was excellent I ordered on a Saturday night and received on Monday afternoon. The hair is extremely soft and dose not have a strong scent to it like most do. The frontal looks great is very soft to touch. I’ll leave another review after install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Soft hair
customer_reviews.text: Hair is soft. Easy to curl. It comes in its raw state but one you flat iron it. It lays down. The bundles are as pictured and thick. I will be buying from this company again. I just bought a wig from them this time and it is soft beautiful and full. I will buy this again! The wig is a 4x4 front lace 22 in body wave human hair wig.
customer_reviews.author: Vanity gaffney

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this hair!! It’s gorgeous and the quality is Amazing !! This is my second time buying!!
customer_reviews.author: Alesha Twitty

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS HAIR!
customer_reviews.text: So listen, It has a hair smell. However this hair is better than most stuff I’ve spent $300-$400 on. It sheds after a few weeks but not terrible. Tangles are at a minimum. Curl pattern doesn’t ever fully return but it’s also not straight after wash. I’ve colored it and it still has same smell. Going on month two and I so need to take it out and reinstall.
customer_reviews.author: Browneyedsuzzie

product_meta.title: Amella Hair 100% Unprocessed Virgin Brazilian Human Hair Brazilian Body Wave 3 Bundles (16 18 20,300g) Hair Extensions Grade 8A Remy Human Hair Bundles Natural Black Color
feature_bullets: Hair Material:100% Unprocessed Brazilian virgin body wave human hair
Hair Quality:Double Machine Weft, High elasticity & Bouncy, Tight & Neat, No Shedding,No Tangle,No Lices,Soft & Shiny.

Hair Color:Natural Black Color;Can be Straightened,Curled,Bleached and Styled as your own hair.
Delivery Time:3-5 working days. (Amazon Prime 1-day shipping, 2-day shipping and standard shipping)
